original_text: Anyone who does not provide for their relatives, and especially for their own household, has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
korean_text: 누구든지 자기 친족 특히 자기 가족을 돌보지 아니하면 믿음을 배반한 자요 불신자보다 더 악한 자니라

sentences.original_text: Anyone who does not provide for their relatives
and especially for their own household
sentences.korean_translation: 특히 자기 가족을 부양하지 않는 사람은

sentences.original_text: and is worse than an unbeliever
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 믿지 않는 사람보다 더 나쁩니다
